code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import TaskForm from"../components/TaskForm";import{getTasks}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditTask=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[task,setTask]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTask=async()=>{const tasks=await getTasks();const currentTask=tasks.find(t=>t.id===parseInt(id));setTask(currentTask);};fetchTask();},[id]);if(!task){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading task..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskForm,{task:task,isEditing:true})});};export default EditTask;
